NL series, EMICO's linear actuators, offer best fits for a variety of applications and can be integrated with sophisticated control applications-providing precise position feedback and ac curate control of the actuator NL series can be available with glove valves range from 15A to 150A. Thrust range from 4KN to 25KN Available in both DC (24V) and AC (110V,220V,380V,440V) voltage.
